# Installation of Packages

---

To install packages needed to run and compile this book you can use the
installation script provided.

```{r, eval=FALSE}

source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lshep/RPC519RBioc/refs/heads/main/installationScript.R")
```

This will install required packages as well as optional packages utilized in the
appendix and quarto used to compile this book. To choose what packages to
install you may reference this [script](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lshep/RPC519RBioc/refs/heads/main/installationScript.R)
and optionally select installs.
